author: jgbutler
msg: Make the new inline parameter mapping work the same as explicit parameter mappings in the case of the type handler (i.e. use of either TypeHandler or TypeHandlerCallback interface is OK).  Now iBATIS is completely consistent in regards to custom type handlers.
